faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of purchase with a valid receipt. Items must be in original condition.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. Shipping fees and delivery times vary by destination.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your package.

faqs.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can change or cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it by contacting our customer service team.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button at the top right corner of the page and fill out the required information.

faqs.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
faqs.answer: If you forget your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer service?
faqs.answer: You can contact our customer service team via email at support@example.com or by calling our toll-free number 1-800-123-4567.

faqs.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a loyalty program where you can earn points on every purchase and redeem them for discounts on future orders.

faqs.question: Are gift cards available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift cards in various denominations. You can purchase them online and have them delivered via email or physical mail.

faqs.question: How do I apply a discount code?
faqs.answer: To apply a discount code, enter the code in the 'Promo Code' box during checkout and click 'Apply'. The discount will be applied to your order total.

faqs.question: What is the estimated delivery time?
faqs.answer: Estimated delivery time varies by location and shipping method. Typically, standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, while express shipping takes 2-3 business days.
